posts.post_title: WTB: T206 PSA 1.5 Cobb Red Portrait
posts.post_content: Title says it all... ready to pay. whatcha got?

Hot damn Leon!
Good luck Taylor!
Why are you so specific on the grade?

1) price range
2) i have OCD and have a PSA 1.5 for both the bat on and bat off... when I go and get the green... it will also be in PSA 1.5 

:-D
